adDetails: Looking to get married at City Hall? Need someone who knows the ins and outs of the building, and not just the same areas? No problem! :) I've walked City Hall (and shot) numerous times and am familiar with the whole process - signing in, waiting around, locations for photos, etc. Rates starting at $350 for up to an hour at City Hall, which includes unlimited photos. show contact info http://www.ianchinphotography.com/city-hall-weddings.html http://www.yelp.com/biz/ian-chin-photography-san-francisco http://www.ianchinphotography.com/testimonials.html LIKE my Facebook page and receive $10 off your rate! https://www.facebook.com/IanChinPhotography keywords : marriage proposals, engagement shoot, photoshoots wedding weddings couples photos posed candid photographer photography unique artistic affordable photos, budget canon
